name: BEATFORMER
description:
Made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2 2021.

An autoscroller platformer where the beat is key. I could not finish the level in time so the track was cut short.

You must play with a 60Hz monitor screen.

///CONTROL///

ARROWS KEYS to move (WASD doesn't work)

Hold Left Click to fire a grenade every 2 beats (Grenades only pushes the player.)

Hold Maj to DASH
